title: Streamline Development Task cards by removing clutter
description: As a project manager, I want Development Task cards to show only essential information so that I can quickly identify actionable items without visual noise. Remove the Branch field, 'PR created and ready for development' status, and Rebase button while keeping the Generate Code action prominent.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Branch field is not displayed in task cards
Default 'PR created and ready for development' status text is removed
Rebase button is not shown in task actions
Generate Code button remains as primary action
Task title and assignee are still visible

tasks.description: Remove branch display from renderCodeWhispererCard function
Remove default PR status text from status logic
